name: Dark KShowOnline
description:
A dark colour theme for KShowOnline.com by /u/iPawk.
Makes it easier on the eyes, and looks more suave and sleek.

user.name: iPawk
user.about: Just a random computer scientist making things easier. Hope you enjoy my work. ;)
